Author: selfcontrolwya
Text: i think a huge thing that helped me was eating out at places that don‚Äôt have calorie counts. it doesn‚Äôt have to be unhealthy, like a local brunch, poke, or sandwich shop. or of course something like a mom&pop pizzeria, etc. now this is the hard part: try to eat your meal when you‚Äôre hungry, just until satiety, and then put down your fork. treat yourself to GOOD food but try to mimic ‚Äúnormal people‚Äù habits. it helped so much for me to go with my dad or friends, they cheered me up and set a good example for me to eat enough but not go overboard (and trigger a binge). hopefully this helps even tho it‚Äôs a jumble of words lol. good luck ü§ì
